booster.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a small quantity of a drug that increases the effect of one that was given before, so that someone continues to be protected against a disease
booster.translation[0].definitions[1].de: something that helps someone or something to increase or improve, or to be more successful or confident
booster.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a profit booster for the company
Mail from home is a big morale booster for faraway troops.
booster.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a rocket that is used to provide extra power for a spacecraft to leave the Earth
booster.translation[0].definitions[3].de: someone who gives a lot of support to a person, organization, or idea
